Implemented Security Controls.Re-Initialization Check: The intitalized flag is set to prevent reinitialization of SetMinSum and SetLogFile functions.
Implemented Security Controls.Balance and Time Checks: Conditions in Collect prevent premature or overdrawn withdrawals, with minimum balance, balance sufficiency, and time-lock checks.

Fallback Functionality: The contract includes a fallback function that redirects Ether sent to the contract to the Put function with a lock time of 0.
